entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is the one who wants to enter her vault. She is referred to as 'madam' by the goblin.

entities.name: griphook
entities.description: Griphook is a goblin who whispers in Harry's ear that the goblins must have been warned about an imposter.

entities.name: travers
entities.description: Travers is one of the goblins who is hanging back and watching Hermione.

entities.name: bellatrix
entities.description: Bellatrix's wand has been stolen, which is known to the goblins of Gringotts.

relationships.description: Griphook informs Harry that the goblins must have been warned about an imposter.
Travers is watching Hermione as she tries to enter her vault.
